meanings.sent1: The old car was depreciable due to its high mileage.
meanings.sent2: The company's equipment is depreciable over a period of five years.
meanings.sent3: The depreciable toaster made everyone laugh when it burnt the toast black.
meanings.sent4: Her depreciable mood sank lower as the rainy day continued.
meanings.sent5: The depreciable building stood abandoned, slowly falling apart.

meanings.sent1: The depreciable currency lost its value rapidly.
meanings.sent2: The depreciable assets of the business needed to be regularly assessed.
meanings.sent3: The depreciable phone battery died just when she needed it most.
meanings.sent4: His depreciable trust in others slowly eroded over time.
meanings.sent5: The depreciable paint on the walls chipped away, revealing the old color underneath.
